template.name: Spec report
template.description: Provides standard report for Structural View. Modified for threat/risk. Does not include inherited ends.

variable.name: DocumentTitle
variable.description: A title of document that is shown on header of every page in document expect the first page.

variable.name: Revisions
variable.description: Describe information of each revision; revision number, revision date, revision author and revision description

variable.name: author
variable.description: Author who edited document in this revision

variable.name: date
variable.description: Date that document was edited in this revision

variable.name: Purpose
variable.description: Describe the objective of this document

variable.name: Scope
variable.description: Provide a short description of the system being specified and its purpose, including relevant benefits, objectives, and goals

variable.name: Overview
variable.description: Describe what the document contains and explain how the document is organized

variable.name: Footer
variable.description: Footer note that is show in footer section in every page expect the first page
